      • getAllNodes

        @GET
 @Produces(value={"application/json","text/plain"})
 @Path(value="/nodes")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAllNodes()
        Returns all nodes.

        Returns all nodes which are known to the controller; these are all nodes specified in the XML-file and parsed on startup. No dynamic information is serialized, only static. E.g. the VLAN and power status is not serialized, but the location. The Response Object holds a JSON representation of a list, which contains all nodes.

        Returns:
        a Response Object with status code 200

      • getExpById

        @GET
 @Produces(value={"json/application","text/plain"})
 @Path(value="/exp/{id}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getExpById(@HeaderParam(value="sessionId")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String sessionId,
                                                                                                                                  @PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String id)
        Returns an experiment.

        Returns an experiment with the given ID in JSON format, the ID is passed through the URI The Response Objects holds the JSON in the message body URI: baseuri:port/mm.controller/rest/get/exp/{id} Possible HTTP status codes:

      • 200: The requested experiment is located in the message body.
      • 401: 401: Unauthorized: Header does not contain a sessionId.
      • 404: The requested experiment with the given ID does not exist.
Parameters:
id - Identifier of the experiment
Returns:
a Response Object

  • getAllExp

    @GET
 @Produces(value={"json/application","text/plain"})
 @Path(value="/exp")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getAllExp(@HeaderParam(value="sessionId")
                                                                                                                            java.lang.String sessionId)
    Returns a list of all experiments.

    Returns a list of all currently existing experiments in JSON format. No input Parameters are required. URI: baseuri:port/mm.controller/rest/get/exp

    Possible HTTP status codes:

  • 200: Header contains valid sessionId.
  • 401: Unauthorized: Header does not contain a sessionId.
Returns:
a Response Object with the JSON in the message body.
